patthana15.33:4.1: Sāsavaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naanāsavo nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana15.33:4.2: Anāsavaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naanāsavo nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā ….
patthana15.33:5.1: Sāsavaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naanāsavo naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana15.33:6.1: Sāsavaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paccayā nasāsavo naabyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā ….
